game.name: Tricky Fox
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Help this little fox by jumping on tiles but don’t fall down! Tricky Fox is the sequel to Tricky Cat with all new gameplay, graphics, music, sounds, and much more levels. Are you able to challenge yourself again?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help this little fox by jumping on tiles but don’t fall down! Tricky Fox is the sequel to Tricky Cat with all new gameplay, graphics, music, sounds, and much more levels. Are you able to challenge yourself again?
